contents.name: WheelAngle
contents.description: Steering wheel angle. Positive = degrees to the left. Negative = degrees to the right.

contents.name: WheelTilt
contents.description: Steering wheel column tilt. 0 = Lowest position. 100 = Highest position.

contents.name: WheelExtension
contents.description: Steering wheel column extension from dashboard. 0 = Closest to dashboard. 100 = Furthest from dashboard.
